title: I am failing at creating a PBE account
body: Hey I've just been accepted to the PBE and I can create my account but when I select the link from the email it just shows that they have received my application. Should I wait a day or so to allow it to sort itself out or is there any help I can be offered?

replies.body: It's being looked into! Hopefully I'll be able to provide an update soon!
YAY ILU . cant wait to try the new mm out
